role.argrole: theme, thing being included in group

example.parse: (S (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS شملت) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM جولة) (NP (NOUN_PROP جنبلاط))) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_ACC بلدات) (NP (NOUN_PROP شحيم) (PUNC ,) (CONJ و) (NOUN_PROP كترمايا) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN_PROP الوردانية) (CONJ و) (NOUN_PROP برجا))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: the cities of Shahim and katrmaya and alwardaniyya and burja

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تشمل) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الصفقة)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NP (NOUN_NUM 53)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الصواريخ))) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تصنع) (NP-OBJ (NP (IVSUFF_DO:3FS ها)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1))) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM شركة) (NP (PUNC ") (NOUN_PROP بوينغ) (PUNC "))))))))))) (CONJ .))

arg.g: 53 rockets made by the Boeing company
